contest-event.event-date: Feb. 2, 1997 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Land of the Mountain and the Flood Leisure Centre, Peterlee, County Durham, England, UK Spennymoor drew number 1 and played wrong arrangement of test piece (arr Eddie Huckridge) when should have played Glenn Bragg arrangement. Were allowed to play again as last band when score for Huckridge arrangement had been given to adjudicator. Prizes - 1st £150 and trophy, 2nd £125 and cup, 3rd £100 and trophy. 9 bands competed. March 27, 2015, 9:58 a.m. Jan. 21, 2017, 10:36 a.m. 1 Barnard Castle Gary Hutchinson 2 Broughtons Brass [Durham] Barry Holden 3 Pride Valley Brass Bob Morton 4 Cockerton Prize Silver Band Anthony Taylor 5 Spennymoor Town Band Neil Davies 6 Hetton Silver Band G. Kitto 7 Greggs Bakery Band Jim Shepherd 8 Felling Band Raymond Poole 9 Billingham Silver Band Vaughan Evans Withdrawn Durham Constabulary Cliff Sayers
